publicationStmt.publisher: The yeare of our Lorde [et] M.CCCCC.XXXviii. per me Joannem Philoponon [i.e. H. Peetersen van Mideelburch?],

notesStmt.note: The imprint is false; actually printed at Antwerp; STC suggests H. Peetersen van Middelburch as printer. Printing formerly attributed to J. Hoochstraten.
Includes "A consolation for troubled consciences", a translation of Martin Luther's "Fourteen consolations", and Savonarola on Psalm 51, reprinted from part 4 of STC 20200.3--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
